title: Development and Application of E-Learning Modules for Improving Healthcare Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: E-learning program for administrative/managerial staff in healthcare institutions. Aims to enhance medical quality management competencies related to their duties through computer-based learning modules.

learning_goals: Learners can explain hand hygiene protocols through e-learning modules and apply them with 80% accuracy
Learners can list key steps of the Community-Acquired Pneumonia (CAP) management protocol and apply them to cases with 90% accuracy
Learners can submit feedback on usability and content suitability of e-learning systems via module evaluation surveys
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
